Method.name: RandomString
Method.Implementation: set str = "" set length = $g(^cAdmin("DevTools","RandomStringLength"),"8100") for { set str = str _ $Char(65 + $Random(25)) quit:$Length(str)>length } quit str

Method.name: Increment
Method.Description: Increments number from 0 to 100, then starts from 0

Method.name: IterateProperty
Method.Implementation:
set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New()
set obj.Name="abd" set obj.SurName="xyz" set propName=$o(obj.%data("")) while propName'="" { set propName=$o(obj.%data(propName)) }
